top_comments.comment: It's always a pleasure dying in your videos

comments_since_last_sample.body:
We can try to understand
The END OF TIMES effect on man!! 

I love it!! I'm singing that line from now on!
This looked nice in my new ultrawide monitor.
More Violet, I absolutely love this whole thing
Yes!! So awesome! Two of my favorite YouTubers doing a metal cover for Halloween. Doesn't get much better than this.
Omg You guys are so imaginative. This is crazy cool. Loved it. Thank you and Happy Halloween. 🎃🎉😁
Happy Halloween Bros, and Violet too!
I never really liked this song... until now! I love the tweaks to the lyrics, too!
Video is awesome, but 21:9 hurts a little my 4:3 PC)
Eeek! I don't think the Bee Gees had the zombie apocalypse in mind when they wrote this. This is better than a music video, it's a mini movie. Bravo!
Love the rewording, great work again.

On Halloween 2016 I almost died.  I had a CVT, which I was unaware of, which had travelled to both lungs.  The ED Dr said if I left it for another 24 hours I'd be dead.  This speaks to me on that level.  Thank you both Melodicka and Violet.
This is an awesome reinterpretation. I'm never gonna look at the original song the same way again.
